name: Tele2 AB
goal: TELE2 IS ONE OF EUROPE'S FASTEST GROWING TELECOM OPERATORS, ALWAYS PROVIDING CUSTOMERS WITH WHAT THEY NEED FOR LESS. We have 17 million customers in 9 countries. Tele2 offers mobile services, fixed broadband and telephony, data network services and content services. Ever since Jan Stenbeck founded the company in 1993, it has been a tough challenger to the former government monopolies and other established providers. Tele2 has been listed on the NASDAQ OMX Stockholm since 1996. In 2016, we had net sales of SEK 28 billion and reported an operating profit (EBITDA) of SEK 5.3 billion.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights
